sentences.en: A specific thin - film technology is based on the use of Copper Indium Diselenide ( CIS ) material.
sentences.cn: 还有一种基于使用铜铟硒化合物 ( CIS ) 材料的特殊薄膜技术.

sentences.en: A synthesis method of indium tris acetylacetonate is introduced.
sentences.cn: 报道了乙酰丙酮铟的合成方法.

sentences.en: Acceptor - An element, such as boron, indium, and gallium used to create free hole in a semiconductor.
sentences.cn: 受主 - 一种用来在半导体中形成空穴的元素, 比如硼 、 铟和镓.

sentences.en: Along with the industrial development. the comprehensive recovery of indium is extensive pay attention to.
sentences.cn: 随着工业的发展, 铟的综合回收得到了广泛重视.

sentences.en: Dectecting little carbon in super pure indium at Chinese and international is still a blank.
sentences.cn: 超纯铟中微量碳的测定在国内外还是一项空白.

sentences.en: Electrodes are made of a transparent conductor called Indium Tin Oxide ( ITO ).
sentences.cn: 电极制成的透明导体所谓的铟锡氧化物 ( 伊藤 ).

sentences.en: He says not only does arsenic belong under phosphorus, I predict that there is an element that lies below aluminum and above indium.
sentences.cn: 他认为不仅砷属于在磷下面，我预言还有一个元素,是在铝之上和铟的下边的。

sentences.en: Indium leaching rate was more than 90 % at optimum conditions.
sentences.cn: 在适宜的条件下,铟的浸出率达到90%以上.

sentences.en: Iron, manganese and lead are the major minerals, accompanying silver and indium.
sentences.cn: 除铁 、 锰、铅外, 伴生有银、铟.

sentences.en: Metal indium is an important rare metal new material.
sentences.cn: 金属铟是重要的稀有金属新材料.

sentences.en: Objective To estabish a method of AES for determianation of Indium and compounds in workplace air.
sentences.cn: 研究工作场所环境空气中二甲基甲酰胺、十一烷和丁酮混合物一次吸附、一次分离的定量分析方法.

sentences.en: Photovoltaic cells rely on amorphous or crystalline silicon, cadmium telluride, or copper indium selenide and sulfide.
sentences.cn: 光伏电池依赖于非晶态或晶态的硅，碲化镉或者硒化、硫化铜铟。

sentences.en: PPY films were prepared by electro - chemical method onto the indium - tin oxide glass ( ITO ).
sentences.cn: 以电化方法在ITO 导电玻璃 基体上制备聚合物聚吡咯薄膜.

sentences.en: Preparation of Indium Tin Oxide ( ITO ) Powders and High - quality ITO Target.
sentences.cn: 纳米金属氧化物的微结构控制及其应用性能研究.

sentences.en: The device's electrode is made from a unique liquid metal called eutectic gallium-indium, which conforms to a surface as it lengthens and relaxes.
sentences.cn: 该设备的电极由被称为共晶镓-铟的独特液态金属制成，当它延展和松弛时，该液态金属沿一个表面变化。

sentences.en: The optimal conditions for spectrophotometric determination of antimony in crude indium with malachite green were investigated.
sentences.cn: 该方法已用于粗铟中锑含量的测定,结果满意.

sentences.en: The optimum determination condition of Indium by flame atomic absorption spectrometry was studied.
sentences.cn: 试验了火焰原子吸收光谱法测定铟的最佳介质及共存元素干扰情况.

sentences.en: This indium isotope was created at the same time as the earth.
sentences.cn: 这种铟同位素与地球产生在同一时代.

trans.tran_en: a rare soft silvery metallic element associated with zinc ores: used in alloys, electronics, and electroplating
